LOAD: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS users (id INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT, name TEXT NOT NULL UNIQUE, email TEXT NOT NULL UNIQUE);

POST.users.default: INSERT INTO users (name, email) SELECT json_extract(?1, '$.name'), json_extract(?1, '$.email');

GET.users.default: SELECT json_object('id', id, 'name', name, 'email', email) FROM users WHERE id = ?;
